prompt: Create a bold search results page with a black background and white accents. Include a search bar at the top with a white magnifying glass icon, placeholder text 'Search products...', and a white border with rounded corners. Below, show a results counter in white text reading '245 results found'. The main content should be a scrollable list of result cards with a black background, white borders, and rounded corners. Each card should have a 100x100 pixel image placeholder on the right, a bold white product title, a price in yellow, a star rating with white stars, and a description in light gray. Place a white 'Details' button at the bottom left. Use 20px padding and 16px spacing for a dramatic layout.
